style: font-size: 40px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 1.65%;top: 3.41%;width: 25.53%;height: 10.52%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
変に
聞こえたら
ごめんね
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.80%;top: 24.42%;width: 22.34%;height: 6.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7.71%;top: 30.20%;width: 25.53%;height: 3.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
世捨て人
の芸術家さん?
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.24%;top: 33.35%;width: 32.13%;height: 5.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.24%;top: 46.50%;width: 8.19%;height: 2.45%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
こんな森の奥深くに１人なんて変だし
向こうに石像があったから。
いえ、あなたは変じゃないわ
変なのは私
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 0.16%;top: 49.64%;width: 29.47%;height: 2.90%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0% 0% 50% 50%;

text:
熱心な彫刻家ね!
あなたが像を作ったの?
生きてるみたい! 触った感じが
まるで本物の…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 33.88%;top: 49.52%;width: 29.47%;height: 3.85%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0% 0% 50% 50%;

font-size: 40px;color: white;background-color: black;left: 81.56%;top: 51.60%;width: 12.84%;height: 2.06%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: transparent;left: 69.68%;top: 63.45%;width: 15.96%;height: 1.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: bold;text-shadow: white 2px 0px,  white -2px 0px, white 0px -2px, white 0px 2px, white 2px 2px , white -2px 2px, white 2px -2px, white -2px -2px, white 1px 2px,  white -1px 2px, white 1px -2px, white -1px -2px, white 2px 1px,  white -2px 1px, white 2px -1px, white -2px -1px;

text:
脆かったのね!!
あなたが何年も
かけて作ったのに!!
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.17%;top: 79.06%;width: 39.85%;height: 6.44%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;border-radius: 0% 0% 0% 50%;

font-size: 18px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 90.74%;top: 90.64%;width: 9.57%;height: 6.39%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50% 50% 0% 0%;

text:
叩いて! それで
気が済むなら!
ご免なさい!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 86.28%;top: 97.17%;width: 14.36%;height: 3.06%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
